name: The Alchemists' Lair
description:
After years of searching for the location of a legendary book called the "Book of Transfiguration," you find a map pointing to its location! Answer to the call of adventure and explore "The Alchemists' Lair!"

This game was made in dedication to my buddy, Brian, for his birthday! I hope everyone enjoys the game as much as I did making it.

For best experience, having pen and paper/notes app on phone is recommended.

Game designed and written by Ben La Rose with Twine 2 and Harlowe 3.2.2. Edited by Monica La Rose.
